entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
